document.full_text: the dalai lama said on thursday that his leadership was as outdated as a monarchy and insisted he would relinquish a four-century old tradition of power despite opposition from within the tibetan government-in-exile.
document.title: dalai lama vows to devolve power, says leadership outdated
lines_and_colors: the dalai lama said on thursday that his leadership was as outdated as a monarchy and insisted he would relinquish a four-century old tradition of power despite opposition from within the tibetan government-in-exile.
